amendment.description: Page 304, beginning on line 3, strike section 1844.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 1844 which provides a limitation on Administrative Expenses for the Social Security Administration.

action.text: Mr. Rehberg raised a point of order against the Tonko amendment (A055). Mr. Rehberg stated that the amendment proposes a net increase in budget authority in the bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Tonko.
